EmailTemplate.description: 7/15/20 changed sender to Adriana MK 1/18/19 renamed NF 1/17/19 changed sender to Katrina 7/31/18 Removed Match Key 7/30/18 Added supported for multiple Qualifying Target Genes and shortened Portal URL which are now supported by Portal 7.1 -AF. 1/8/17 Active IOE Email. MS 10/13/17 Deprecated since A/B test in Sep showed patient initials had no effect on response rates. Subject line with patient initials. To be sent starting 8/21 to ordering physicians who have a new match.
